name: Awakening: The Redleaf Forest HD - A Magical Hidden Object Adventure
name_original: Awakening: The Redleaf Forest HD - A Magical Hidden Object Adventure
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Queen Sophia has come a long way since she awoke in the Dreamless Castle. She was able to save her kingdom but her parents remain asleep after a battle with Dreadmyre. Will Sophia finally defeat the evil which has shadowed over her journey and be able to reunite with her parents?

• THE FINAL JOURNEY BEGINS HERE!
Queen Sophia embarks on one final quest to find her parents' lost souls so that they may be reunited once again.

• FIND THE ONE WHO CAN BREAK THE SPELL ON SOPHIA’S PARENTS
Travel through stunningly beautiful scenes in search of the Enchantress who can break the spell besieged upon her parents! Use your wits to solve exciting puzzles and mini-games!

• DISCOVER THE BLADE OF COURAGE
Journey to the Redleaf Forest to find the centaur who can help Sophia forge the Blade of Courage and defeat the evil Dreadmyre!

• MEET THE SKYWARD KINGDOM’S LITTLEST PRINCESS IN THE BONUS CHAPTER!
Keep on the lookout for collectible lilies hidden throughout the game and collect achievements along the way! Plus, enjoy replayable cutscenes, wallpapers, and concept art.
